paragraph.materialsCitation:
BIN : BOLD : ACE3629 (n=3 from Ethiopia , n=5 from Gambia, Mali and Mauritania ; maximum variation 1.4%). Genetically exactly matching the sequence of the holotype . Nearest species:
Z. latilimbata
(1.1%)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Djibuti, Egypt , Ghana , Nigeria , Saudi Arabia , Senegal , Sudan , Yemen ( Fletcher 1974 ; Hausmann et al ., 2016). New for Ethiopia , Gambia , Mali and Mauritania .
